overview:
Henri Pidault is responsible for Kyriba’s worldwide product, platform and technology operations.

Prior to joining Kyriba, Henri was CIO of Compagnie Des Alpes, a publicly-listed company which specializes in operating major ski resorts across Europe. Before then, he was CIO of audit and consulting group, Mazars, and also served as deputy CIO at global IT outsourcer, Atos.

Henri started his career as the founder and director of research and development at CAD software developer, Strategies S.A.

Henri graduated from the prestigious École Normale Supérieure and holds a doctorate in Electromechanics. He is based in Kyriba’s European Operations center in Paris.
